rules_text:
Draw three cards, then discard a card.
Call The Beast. [i](You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)[/i]
Jump-start. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]
